page.title: 12SCHOOL BUSES
page.content: Mr.Allan owns a{garage}in Cross. He took on the job of running the 4{ {school buses}in August 1983. There are 2 red buses and 2 blue buses. Two are{ {Fords}and the other 2 are{British {Leyland Sherpas.}The type of fuel they use is{petrol.}Only one bus has the same tyres as it had in August 1983, the other 3 have had 7 or 8 new ones between them since then. One of the buses is also used as an{ambulance}and a{hearse,}but no other people use the school buses. Each bus holds{12 or 13} children - one goes to the North end, one goes to Lady, one goes to the South end and the other one goes to Cross & Burness. Mr.Tulloch drives our bus and he has to stop 13 times to let people off.
